# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int = 10)
  words = parse.(String, text)
  wrapped = []
  current_line = ""

  for word in words
    if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
      push!(wrapped, current_line)
      current_line = word
    else
      if length(current_line) > 0
        current_line += " "
      end
      current_line += word
    end
  end

  if length(current_line) > 0
    push!(wrapped, current_line)
  end

  join(wrapped, "\n")
end

wrap_string("This is a long sentence that will be wrapped")
```
